property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker During your turn, when you summon a non-evolution water or fire creature, you may put that creature on the top of your deck face-up. If you do, put that creature into the battle zone from the top of your deck. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all psychic creatures. Players can"t put psychic creatures into the battle zone. Quattro breaker Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Super Infinite evolution - Put on one or more of your creatures that has each civilization: Light, Water, Darkness, Fire, and Nature. Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of multicolored creatures from the revealed cards into the battle zone for no cost and cast any number of multicolored spells for no cost. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your other Aliens from the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, put one of your Aliens that costs less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

card.name: Joan of Arc, Goddess of Ruin

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Demon Command/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Blocker This creature can"t attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each light Hunter creature you have in the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card in his hand and discards it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Cyber Command/Flame Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Super Infinite evolution - Put on one or more of your creatures that has each civilization: Light, Water, and Fire. Whenever this creature would break one of your opponent"s shields, your opponent reveals the shield instead. From among it, cast all revealed spells for no cost, then put them into their owner"s graveyard. Then, this creature breaks that shield. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature or another creature into the battle zone, draw a card, then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Whenever this creature attacks, shuffle all cards in your graveyard face down and put them on the bottom of your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Speed attacker Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent reveals that shield instead. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than any of the revealed cards from that shield from your hand into the battle zone. Then, break that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a multicolored creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn"t untap at the start of your opponent"s next turn.

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. If they all have the same cost, you may reveal them, then add them to your hand. Otherwise, put them on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent"s creature in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 for each civilization on your cards in the battle zone until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Hunters in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. If you have 7 or more Hunters in the battle zone, destroy all your opponent"s creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: World breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Gel Fish

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) At the start of your turn, if you have 4 "Keroyon Quartet " in the battle zone, you win the game. When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution - Put on one of your Hunter creatures. Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it into his graveyard. Then, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Hunting Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Gel Fish/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Space Charge: Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone. Destroy it, return it to its owner"s hand, or put it into its owner"s shield zone face down.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Gao Monster/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Super Infinite evolution - Put on one or more of your creatures that has each civilization: Light, Darkness, and Fire. At the start of each player"s turns, that player chooses one of his non-multicolored creatures and destroys it. Double breaker

card.name: Deis Al Maaz, Guardian of Flight

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Space Charge: Choose one of your shields and one of your opponent"s shields and look at them. Then, choose one of the chosen shields, and you may put that shield on the bottom of its owner"s deck. If you do, that player adds the top card of their deck to their shields face down. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Wild Veggies/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Space Charge: Each of your cards in the battle zone and your mana zone are considered to be cards of all civilizations until the end of the turn.

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Space Charge: Your opponent chooses a card in his hand and discards it. Power Attacker +3000 When this creature would break a shield, if your opponent has no cards in his hand, put it into your opponent"s graveyard instead. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Rainbow Command Dragon/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Space Charge: Put a non-evolution creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. This turn, that creature gets "Speed Attacker". At the end of that turn, put that creature on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, draw 2 cards. If you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, your opponent discards 2 cards from his hand. If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose and destroy up to 2 of your opponent"s creatures that have power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} For each civilization you have in the battle zone, choose one of your opponent"s creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent"s psychic creatures that have total power 8000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Race
property.value: Wild Veggies/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +2000 power for each of your civilizations in the battle zone. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "Double Breaker".

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} Blocker This creature can"t attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent"s psychic creatures in the battle zone and return it it to its owner"s hyperspatial zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both::► Choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap it.:► Choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner"s hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a multicolored psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic Saver

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both::► One of your creatures breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.:► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: :► Draw up to 2 cards, then discard a card.:► Your opponent draws a card, then chooses 2 cards in his hand and discards them.

property.name: Race
property.value: Flame Monster/Blue Monster/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Space Charge: Put a multicolored Alien psychic creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Race
property.value: Melt Warrior/Dark Lord/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when this creature is destroyed, choose a card in your opponent"s hand at random, and your opponent reveals that card. Put a Hunter psychic creature that shares a civilization with the revealed card that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both.:► Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.:► Destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both.:► Shuffle all cards in your graveyard other than this card. Choose a card at random and put it into your hand. Then, return the remaining cards into your graveyard face-up.:► Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
